CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Cloud PKI
CurrentVersion.description: A cloud-based certification authority to create, deploy, and manage certificates for secure authentication and Wi-Fi, VPN scenarios.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Cloud PKI
OldVersion.description: A cloud-based certification authority to create, deploy, and manage certificates for secure authentication and Wi-Fi, VPN scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
CurrentVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
OldVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
OldVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Access Microsoft Lists, Power BI, Loop and Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: You will be able to easily find and open your Microsoft Lists, Loops, Power BI dashboards and Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web. If you have recently opened, shared, or favorited one of these files, then it will appear in your Recent, Shared, and Favorites views in OneDrive for Web.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Access Microsoft Lists, Power BI, Loop and Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description:
You will be able to
easily find and open your Microsoft Lists, Loops, Power BI dashboards and
Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web. If you have recently opened, shared, or
favorited one of these files, then it will appear in your Recent, Shared, and
Favorites views in OneDrive for Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): GA for enterprise secure AI controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description:
,Enterprise secure AI controls are now available in the Microsoft Edge management service. This feature provides a new dedicated space for admins to manage all AI-related policies in the Edge browser. This will help enhance security and productivity for managed users and devices.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): GA for enterprise secure AI controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
OldVersion.description:
,Enterprise secure AI controls are now available in the Microsoft Edge management service. This feature provides a new dedicated space for admins to manage all AI-related policies in the Edge browser. This will help enhance security and productivity for managed users and devices.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Copilot in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Planner Copilot
OldVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
OldVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
OldVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
OldVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Assigned to Me view for Project tasks
CurrentVersion.description: View and update (i.e. mark as complete and progress) all the tasks assigned to you across projects in one place, with the Assigned to Me view. This view appears in the app of the user’s choice—Microsoft Planner, Tasks app in Teams, or Microsoft To Do.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Assigned to Me view for Project tasks
OldVersion.description: View and update (i.e. mark as complete and progress) all the tasks assigned to you across projects in one place, with the Assigned to Me view. This view appears in the app of the user’s choice—Microsoft Planner, Tasks app in Teams, or Microsoft To Do.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enable/Disable Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to enable or disable the entire Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing services.  Disabling the service prevents any models of this type from running.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Enable/Disable Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to enable or disable the entire Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing services.  Disabling the service prevents any models of this type from running.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
OldVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Restricted SharePoint Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restricted SharePoint Search (RSS) is a setting that will allow Global/Tenant and SharePoint Admins to disable organization-wide search and select a set of curated SharePoint sites. These selected sites, along with the users’ OneDrive files and content, will then become accessible in search and in the Copilot experiences. This means that whether you have Enterprise Search or Restricted SharePoint Search enabled, users in your organization will still be able to interact with their OneDrive information in Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Restricted SharePoint Search
OldVersion.description: Restricted SharePoint Search (RSS) is a setting that will allow Global/Tenant and SharePoint Admins to disable organization-wide search and select a set of curated SharePoint sites. These selected sites, along with the users’ OneDrive files and content, will then become accessible in search and in the Copilot experiences. This means that whether you have Enterprise Search or Restricted SharePoint Search enabled, users in your organization will still be able to interact with their OneDrive information in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Interact with Copilot in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Interact with Copilot in Outlook, ask questions, or provide instructions directly inside Outlook. Users can type and receive responses from Copilot in a right-hand side panel that can be opened by the user by clicking on the Copilot icon in the top nav bar. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text prediction for Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: When you compose or reply to a message in Teams, Editor Text Predictions anticipates your writing and suggests a suitable word or phrase inline. This saves time and helps you reduce typos. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable. We apologize for the delay in updating this information.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text prediction for Teams mobile
OldVersion.description: When you compose or reply to a message in Teams, Editor Text Predictions anticipates your writing and suggests a suitable word or phrase inline. This saves time and helps you reduce typos.

With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.
